evs.metric.metrics
Class MeanContRankProbScore

java.lang.Object
  evs.metric.metrics.Metric
      evs.metric.metrics.ScoreMetric
          evs.metric.metrics.MeanContRankProbScore
All Implemented Interfaces:
BootstrapableMetric, DecomposableScore, EnsembleMetric, ThresholdMetric, java.lang.Comparable
Direct Known Subclasses:
MeanContRankProbSkillScore
public class MeanContRankProbScore
extends ScoreMetric
implements EnsembleMetric, ThresholdMetric, DecomposableScore, BootstrapableMetric

The Continuous Ranked Probability Score (CRPS) is the integrated squared difference between the cumulative distributions of the forecasts and the observations, where the cdf of the observations is given by the Heaviside function (pdf is the dirac delta function). For multiple forecasts, the average of these squared differences is computed, leading to the mean CRPS.

Version:
4.0
Author:
evs@hydrosolved.com

Attempts to construct a mean CRPS object with associated parameters.

Parameters:
decompose - is true to decompose the score
fType - the forecast types
unconditional - is true to always use unconditional pairs, false to use conditional pairs when available
minS - the minimum sample size
bs - the bootstrap parameter

compute

public MetricResult[] compute(int forecastType,
                              PairedData paired,
                              MetricResult refResult)
                       throws MetricCalculationException
Uses the specified paired data to compute and return the result of the metric. The metric results are returned, together with the sample counts, but not stored locally. The metric result is located in the first index of the return array and the sample counts are located in the second index. Optionally, specify the results of a reference forecast from which to compute skill if the metric is a skill score.

Specified by:
compute in class Metric
Parameters:
forecastType - the forecast type
paired - the paired data
refResult - the results for a reference forecast (may be null)
Returns:
the metric result and sample counts
Throws:
MetricCalculationException

getMeanCRPSHersbach

public MetricResult getMeanCRPSHersbach(DoubleMatrix2D data,
                                        double nV)
Returns the mean CRPS from the input data. The input should comprise one column of observations (at index 0) and the remaining n columns should comprise the n ensemble members (index 1 through n).

Parameters:
data - the input data
nV - the null value
Returns:
the mean CRPS

getMeanCRPSWithNulls

public MetricResult getMeanCRPSWithNulls(DoubleMatrix2D data,
                                         double nV)
Returns the mean CRPS from the input data. The input should comprise one column of observations (at index 0) and the remaining n columns should comprise the n ensemble members (index 1 through n). This method can handle forecasts with null ensemble members, but cannot compute the decomposition.

Parameters:
data - the input data
nV - the null value
Returns:
the mean CRPS

getCRPSScatter

public static double[][] getCRPSScatter(double[][] data,
                                        double nV,
                                        boolean normalize)
                                 throws MetricCalculationException
Returns the CRPS for each verification pair within the input array. Optionally, the forecast may be normalized by (y-E[Y])*Var[Y]^-1 and the observation by x-E[Y]. The results comprise the following columns: Column 0: the CRPS Column 1: the observed value (not normalized) Column 2: the forecast mean (not normalized) Column 3: the forecast median (not normalized) Column 4: the forecast mode (not normalized) Column 5: the error of the forecast mean (E[Y]-x) (not normalized) Column 6: the forecast spread (not normalized)

Parameters:
data - the input data
nV - the null value identifier
normalize - is true to normalize the CRPS for each verification pair by the forecast mean and spread
Throws:
MetricCalculationException

getCRPSSingleCase

public static double getCRPSSingleCase(double[] data,
                                       double nV)
                                throws MetricCalculationException
Returns the CRPS for a single case, comprising the observation in the first entry and the ensemble members in the remaining entries.

Parameters:
data - the input data
nV - the null value identifier
Throws:
MetricCalculationException

getMeanCRPSWithNullsDeprecated

@Deprecated
public MetricResult getMeanCRPSWithNullsDeprecated(DoubleMatrix2D data,
                                                              double nV)
Deprecated. 

Returns the mean CRPS from the input data. The input should comprise one column of observations (at index 0) and the remaining n columns should comprise the n ensemble members (index 1 through n-1). This method can handle forecasts with null ensemble members, but cannot compute the decomposition. ******THIS METHOD CONTAINS ERRORS******.

Parameters:
data - the input data
nV - the null value
Returns:
the mean CRPS
